opinion.court: Supreme Court of the United States
opinion.case_name: State of Louisiana Ex Rel. Steve Washington v. V. G. Walker

opinion:
370 U.S. 726

82 S.Ct. 1572

8 L.Ed.2d 802

STATE OF LOUISIANA ex rel. Steve WASHINGTON
v.
V. G. WALKER

No. 900, Misc.

Supreme Court of the United States

June 25, 1962

Robert H. Reiter and Jack N. Rogers, for appellant.

Jack P. F. Gremillion, Atty. Gen. of Louisiana, and Scallan E. Walsh, Asst. Atty. Gen., for appellee.

PER CURIAM.

1

The motion to dismiss is granted and the appeal is dismissed for want of a substantial federal question.

2

Mr. Justice FRANKFURTER took no part in the consideration or decision of this case.
